Package ui_action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExitGame
    Action that happens when player clicks the exit button.
    LoadGame
    Action that happens when player clicks the load game button as well as anything in the loading interface.
    NewGame
    Action that happens when player clicks the New Game button.
    OptionsAccept
    Action that happens when player clicks Accept in the Options menu.
    OptionsCancel
    Action that happens when player clicks Cancel in the Options menu.
    OptionsOpen
    Action that happens when player clicks the Options button.
    ResumeGame
    Action that happens when the player clicks the Resume button in the in-game menu.
    SaveGameAccept
    Handles what happens when the player clicks accept from the save game menu.
    SaveGameCancel
    Handles what happens when the player clicks Cancel from the save game menu.
    SaveGameOpen
    Brings up the Save Game menu.
    TutorialClose
    Removes the Tutorial Menu from view and brings back the main menu.
    TutorialOpen
    Brings up the tutorial menu.
